short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Modria with fast document access, arbitrator stats, quick award search, a settlement calculator, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No Fault Arbitration Pro is a Chrome Extension specifically designed for attorneys handling arbitration of New York no-fault cases. It enhances the functionality of the Modria interface to increase efficiency and productivity.

Latest Updates:
----------------------------------
----------------------------------
ver 7.13.2
- Fixed: Setting reset every time chrome restart

ver 7.13.1
Features:
- Added Arbitrator data table
- Added Toast messages for 'Case No' and 'Applicant File No.'
- Minor stability improvements


----------------------------------
FEATURES:

- Related Cases Award Search - Now you can quickly search the text of prior awards in Related/Linked Cases.  Look for the Related Cases Award Search button at the top right of the Related Cases grid.

- Case documents popup screen with pdf merge feature. Setting page gives the choice to open in new tab or download the files.

- Holding column added to Award Search.

- Added the Award Date and Holding columns to the Related Cases (aka Linked Cases) grid.

- Streamlined Document Access: Quick access to all case-related documents with a single click.

- Arbitrator Data: Gain direct access to key information about the assigned arbitrator, including award holding rates, award volume, and expected time from hearing to award.

- Fast Award Search: Enables very quick and efficient searching of an arbitrator's prior awards.

- Settlement Calculator: Calculate principal, interest, and attorney's fees directly on the case page without need for external tools or applications.
